inclusion.criterion: HLA genotype identical donor and hemoglobin SS, hemoglobin SC, or hemoglobin Sb0/+
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Previous central nervous system vaso-occlusive episode with or without residual neurologic findings
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Frequent painful vaso-occlusive episodes which significantly interfere with normal life activities and which necessitate chronic transfusion therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Severe anemia which prevents acceptable quality of life and necessitates chronic transfusion therapy
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Between the ages of birth and 40 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with biopsy proven chronic active hepatitis or fibrosis with portal bridging
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with SCD chronic lung disease > stage 3 (see Appendix 1)
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a history of sickle cell crises since childhood and has had severe pain in his lower back that radiated to both thighs scored 9 out of 10. He is currently experiencing similar symptoms treated with oxycodone which was not beneficial to his pain.
